DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : - Assess impact intervention adoption healthy lifestyle among pregnant woman high risk gestational diabetes mellitus : - weight gain pregnancy - level maternal fetal adipokines - glycemic control maternal fetal . - Determine whether adoption healthy lifestyles pregnancy associate epigenetic change influence level adipokines glucose regulation pregnancy newborn .
DOC.brief_title: Intervention Promote Changes Healthy Lifestyle ( Physical Activity Nutrition ) During Gestation
DOC.criteria: age ≥ 18 year , prepregnancy BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 , risk develop gestational diabetes mellitus ( history gestational diabetes mellitus glucose 1 hour post50g > 7.1 mmol/L . Prepregnancy diabetes detect first trimester ( A1c > 6.5 % , fast glucose > 7.0 mmol/L , random blood glucose > 11.1 mmol/L , glucose > 10.3 mmol/L 1 hour post50g ) twin pregnancy take medication affect blood sugar weight , practice ≥ 150 minute physical activity per week formalindication physical activity .
